about_the_game:
Spaceborne Fighters is a dynamic action platformer that takes you to arenas filled with battles against hordes of enemies. The game combines intense action with strategic elements, offering players countless possibilities for character development and tactical approaches to combat.

Key Features:

  • Arena Battles: Traverse 10 unique maps, each with its own style and challenges. Fight enemies in dynamic battles where every move and decision can determine your fate.
  • Character Development: Each of the 10 characters has their own skill tree, allowing for permanent upgrades. Collect skill points and freely choose which character to develop and which skills to unlock, supporting you on every map.
  • Random Skills: On each map, draw new skills at every experience level. These temporary skills provide additional support and tactical variety during gameplay.
  • Item Crafting: Gather resources and craft powerful items to aid you in battle. Experiment with different combinations to find the most effective tools to defeat your enemies.
  • Character Variety: Choose from 10 different characters, each with unique abilities and play styles. Find the hero that best matches your combat style.
  • Intense Action: Enjoy fast-paced and thrilling gameplay that provides adrenaline and satisfaction from overcoming challenges.

Spaceborne Fighters is a game that not only delivers intense entertainment but also presents players with challenges requiring strategic thinking and quick decision-making. Prepare for epic battles, develop your skills, and become the best fighter in the cosmos!

name: Spaceborne Fighters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 660/Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 760/Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final

short_description: Spaceborne Fighters is a dynamic action platformer featuring arena battles against hordes of enemies. Explore 10 diverse maps, develop your character through skill trees, and craft items to face challenges in the most spectacular way.
